game

Class MainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.MainGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class MainGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Main game logic and drawing, implements Screen.

      Set all the game timers according to globalTime.
      void show()

      Spawn a FireBall depending on Player location on x axis.
      private void spawnFireBall()
      Spawn a FireBall on a random point of x axis.
      private void spawnFireBall(FireBall lastFireball)
      Spawn a FireBall depending on how far has previous FireBall traveled on y axis.
      private void spawnFireBallsBasedOnY()
      Spawn a FireBall using spawnFireBall() or spawnFireBall(FireBall).
      private void spawnLifePickup()
      Spawns a LifePickup every 1000 points in a random location on top half of the screen.
      private void spawnStarPickup()
      Spawns a StarPickup every 10 seconds in a random location on top half of the screen.
      private void update(float delta)
      All the updates are placed here, also contains music volume.
      private void updateDirectedFireBall()
      Updates directed fireballs x and y x coordinates or destroys it.
      private void updateFireballs()
      All the fire ball updates are placed here.
      private void updateLifePickup()
      Updates life pickup, sets LifePickup.quarterLifeReached or destroys it.
      private void updatePlayerScore()
      Updates player score according to scoreStartTime, globalFireBallMovementSpeed and Player.starPickupActive
      private void updateStarPickup()
      Updates star pickup, destroys it if necessary.

      • update

        private void update(float delta)
        All the updates are placed here, also contains music volume. When game returns from pause volume is set here.
        Parameters:
        delta - frame delta time

      • updateFireballs

        private void updateFireballs()
        All the fire ball updates are placed here.

        Updates directed fireballs x and y x coordinates or destroys it.

        Check if directed FireBall has hit Player

      • fireBallsCollisionDetection

        private void fireBallsCollisionDetection(FireBall fireBall)
        Checks if FireBall has hit Player. This triggers global FireBall movement speed and spawn distance reset
        Parameters:
        fireBall - requires FireBall

      • pickupCollisionDetection

        private void pickupCollisionDetection()
        All beneficial pickup collision with Player

      • allFireBallCollisionAndMovement

        private void allFireBallCollisionAndMovement()
        FireBall Array is iterated here. fireBallsCollisionDetection(game.FireBall) and allFireBallSpeedAndSpawnDistance() is called. x and y coordinates are updated depending on globalFireBallMovementSpeed.

      • allFireBallSpeedAndSpawnDistance

        private void allFireBallSpeedAndSpawnDistance()
        Increases fireball speed and decreases spawn y distance every half a second.

      • spawnLifePickup

        private void spawnLifePickup()
        Spawns a LifePickup every 1000 points in a random location on top half of the screen.

      • spawnStarPickup

        private void spawnStarPickup()
        Spawns a StarPickup every 10 seconds in a random location on top half of the screen.

      • spawnFireBallsBasedOnY

        private void spawnFireBallsBasedOnY()
        Spawn a FireBall using spawnFireBall() or spawnFireBall(FireBall).

      • spawnFireBall

        private void spawnFireBall()
        Spawn a FireBall on a random point of x axis.

      • spawnFireBall

        private void spawnFireBall(FireBall lastFireball)
        Spawn a FireBall depending on how far has previous FireBall traveled on y axis.
        Parameters:
        lastFireball - requires FireBall

        private void spawnDirectedFireBall()
        Spawn a FireBall depending on Player location on x axis.
